About

Let's get acquainted closer

About me

I'm a hardworking, detail-oriented web developer, passionate about creating beautiful code using best practices.

I love learning new and better ways to create user experiences with clean, efficient, and scalable code. I consider work an ongoing education, and I'm always looking for opportunities to work with those who are willing to share their knowledge as much as I want to learn. At the end of the day, my primary goal is to create something beautiful with people that bring out the best in me.

My open source experience

  • Redux-pending-effects

    Briefly about the library itself: it's a redux toolkit that tracks your asynchronous redux actions (effects) and informs you of the pending state using the selector function. You can use this library together with redux-saga, redux-toolkit, and redux-promise-middleware.

    My contribution to the project:

    • Developed a playground app to show and test redux-pending-effects integration with each of the libraries, mentioned above
    • Increased test coverage - add tests for library selector
    • Added the ability to ignore specific action types
    • Added middleware to track saga effects
    • Updated docs according to new features
    Link on the library

  • Grommet

    Briefly about the grommet: it's a react-based library of components, that provides accessibility, modularity, responsiveness, and theming in a tidy package

    My contribution to the project:

    • Developed new functionality - the ability to set different icons for a menu the component according to it's opened/closed state
    Link on the PR

My works

  • Webpack configuration

    In this project, I have practiced with Webpack and created my own custom configuration - CRA analog. It includes support of React, TS, SASS and contains optimization mechanisms.

    Code

  • Redux store

    A simple book store, where you can add the book to the cart, increase/decrease amount of books in the cart, delete a book from the cart, and also you can see the total order price and books count in the header.

    View Code

  • Password Manager

    In this project, I have practiced working with Hooks (useState, useContext, useEffect, useCallback, custom Hooks), Firebase, Context. And I also used prop-types & react-router-dom libraries

  • Star DB

    In this project I have practiced working with: Fetch API, React Lifecycle Methods, Children & Context API, default props, prop-types & react-router-dom libraries.

    View Code

  • Todo List

    In this project I have learned to work with: create-react-app, JSX, props, functional and class components, state, setState, events, controllable components and forms in React.

  • Hillel graduation project

    It's a project where I had my first experience of working in a team (5 people were participating in the development). It's a multipage online store on pure JS, where you can filter goods, add/remove goods from the basket, place an order

    View Code

  • Todo List

    In this todo-list initial data is located in data.json file. So, in this project, I've trained with AJAX requests to the server using Fetch API, and also combined Gulp with Webpack.
